price: To je zbog djela vaših ruku, a Allah, zaista, ne čini nepravdu robovima Svojim.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّامٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dhālika bimā qaddamat aydīkum wa-anna al-laha laysa biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
